name: HTML
description: I'm good at writing HTML. I make sure my code is semantic and accessible.

name: CSS
description: I use CSS to style websites in a clean and consistent way. I often work with layout, animations and responsiveness.

name: Javascript
description: I use JavaScript to make websites interactive. I understand the basics and use it for logic and DOM manipulation.

name: Typescript
description: I'm still learning TypeScript. I used it during my internship and in one school project.

name: D3.js
description: I used D3.js to create data visualizations in a school project. I learned how to bind data to elements and create charts.

name: Node.js
description: I used Node.js in school projects to run a simple server. I applied CRUD and loaded data dynamically.

name: Express
description: I used Express with Node.js to build simple backend routes. I used it to handle requests and work with dynamic data.

name: EJS
description: I used EJS to render dynamic HTML in Node.js projects. It helped me show data from the server inside templates.

name: Tailwind
description: I use Tailwind to build quick and responsive layouts. I like how fast and flexible it is to work with.

name: Wordpress
description: I used WordPress during a short internship project. I know the basics, but there's still a lot to improve.

name: SvelteKit
description: I'm learning SvelteKit and have done multiple projects with Svelte. I understand the basics and enjoy working with components and routes.

name: Eleventy
description: I use Eleventy to build fast static websites. I work a lot with templates, collections and data files.

name: Git & GitHub
description: I use Git to manage my code and work with others. I know how to commit, push, pull and create branches.

name: Figma
description: I use Figma to design websites and create prototypes. I like how it helps me visualize my ideas.

name: Adobe Cloud
description: I use Adobe tools like Photoshop and Illustrator for design work. I create graphics and edit images for my projects.
